fields.name: ref_number
fields.title: Reference Number
fields.description: The unique reference number given to each line item in the spreadsheet. Having a unique identifier for each item will allow departments to locate a specific item in the system if revisions or deletions are required. This element will not be displayed to the public.

fields.name: title_en
fields.title: Title (English)
fields.description: The English name by which the dataset is known.

fields.name: description_en
fields.title: Description (English)
fields.description: An account of the dataset, in English. A description may include but is not limited to, an abstract, a table of contents, or a free-text account of the dataset.

fields.name: publisher_en
fields.title: Publisher - Name at Publication (English)
fields.description: Name, in English, of the organization primarily responsible for publishing the dataset at the time of the publication (if applicable, i.e. if different than current name).

fields.name: date_published
fields.title: Date Published
fields.description: The date of issuance (e.g., publication) of the dataset

fields.name: size
fields.title: Size
fields.description: The [estimated] size of the resource(in Bytes)

fields.name: eligible_for_release
fields.title: Eligible for Release
fields.description: Is all of the content within the dataset eligible to be publicly released based on the application of the Eligibility Criteria in the Guide to Implementing the Directive on Open Government?

fields.name: program_alignment_architecture_en
fields.title: Program Alignment Architecture (English)
fields.description: The Program Alignment Architecture (PAA) in English. The Program Alignment Architecture (PAA) is an inventory of each organization’s programs. It provides an overview of the organization’s responsibilities.

fields.name: date_released
fields.title: Date Released
fields.description: The date on which the metadata record was released, made available, on the Open Government portal; only if applicable

fields.name: portal_url_en
fields.title: Open Government Portal Record (English)
fields.description: The location for online access to the distribution of the resource, in French. This element is only mandatory if applicable The entry should point to the metadata record page on Open.Canada.ca.

fields.name: user_votes
fields.title: User Votes
fields.description: Count of users that voted for this dataset on open.canada.ca
